title: AUTOMATIC ANTI-FLOODING BARRIER
fig_desc: Fig. 7 and 8 are a schematic top view and perspective view, respectively, of a barrier integrated into a masonry structure, with the platform in a partially raised position, according to an embodiment of the present invention
